Reference

Clean and tranfrom variables

Functions for cleaning and transforming variables

bll_flow()

Makes an object an instance of bll_flow and returns it. This function should be run on all the variables in the initial data set

buildInteractionsList()

Builds the interactions list for the provided rows

buildProjectFiles()

Builds several R files from the web spec csv file located at the path specified by the webSpecCsvFilePath argument. The R files are written to the folder whose path is specified in the projectFolderPath arg

center.bll_flow()

Centers the x argument using the provided mean argument and returns a new bll_flow variable

formatInteractionVariable()

Formats a variable name for interaction

getCodeForCenteredVariable()

Returns R code to center a variable

getCodeForDummyVariable()

Returns variable which contains dummying code for a categorical variable

getCodeForInteraction()

Returns code for an interaction

isInInteractionsList()

Checks whether an interactions is already present in the interactionsList arg

isPortWebSpecFile()

Checks whether a web spec file is for a PORT algorithm or for a RESPECT algorithm

Making test data

A bllFlow ….

assign_first_event()

Assign the earliest event, when there are multiple events

make_event_dates()

Add an event date, when you only have an event probability
